Drinking soy drinks before glucose test defeats the purpose of the test since soy drinks contain lots of sugars.Ants in the toilet indicates excessive sugar in your urine. If you have excess sugar in your body, the body tries to eliminate it by way of your urine. This is a marker for diabetes. Go get an A1c test to confirm what your glucose levels are. Lab results are your for the asking by law so always get a copy for your own records.There is no cure for diabetes but Lifestyle change is the key for all diabetics. Blood sugar levels can be stabilized by improving nutrition, adding exercise and achieving a healthy weight.
